balanceOf().details: Returns the balance of the strategy in the underlying token

params._want: Address of the token this strategy accepts

emergencyWithdraw().details: Emergency withdraw all funds from the strategy This function should be implemented by each specific strategy

getAPY().details: Returns the current APY of the strategy in basis points (1% = 100)

getRiskScore().details: Returns the risk score of the strategy

getTVL().details: Returns the current TVL (Total Value Locked) in the strategy

getTotalDeposits().details: Returns the total amount of tokens deposited in the strategy

isPaused().details: Checks if the strategy is paused

name().details: Returns the name of the strategy

withdrawAll().details: Withdraws all funds from the strategy This function should be implemented by each specific strategy
